TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IJSVsaCodeItem implements class Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

Docs.summary: Represents a code item to be compiled by the script engine.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddEventSource (string eventSourceName, string eventSourceType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddEventSource(string eventSourceName, string eventSourceType) cil managed

Docs.param: A programmatic name of the event source.
The type name of the event source.
Docs.summary: Adds an event source to the code item. The code item uses the event source to hook up an event to the named event source by calling the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method, which is implemented by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AppendSourceText(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: The text to be appended to the code item.
Docs.summary: Appends specified text to the end of the code item.
Gets the code document object model (CodeDOM) represented in the code item.
Docs.value: Returns the CodeDOM for the code item.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveEventSource(string eventSourceName) cil managed

Docs.param: The programmatic name of the event source to be removed.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified event source from the code item.
Sets or gets the text of a specified code item, including auto-generated code, if any.
Docs.value: Returns the source text of the code item.
